Text: Pawn Stars UK is a British reality television series which debuted on 26 August 2013 on the British version of the History channel.
Triplets:<Pawn Stars UK
1:
--------------------
Text: Pawn Stars UK:  The series is filmed in Sealand, Flintshire in Wales, and chronicles the day-to-day activities of pawn shop Regal Pawn, collaboratively run by Mark Andrew Manning, Mark Lever Holland, Marco Peter Holland, Simon Penworth, and Vicki Manning.
Triplets:<Mark Andrew Manning
